The-Endless-Hunger.name: The Endless Hunger
description: Malkir, the @+Unending Hunger+@, is the goblinoid deity of feasts and cannibalism. He are most often depicted as a horned, pale-skinned, corpulent goblinoid seated upon a throne. Often, in more elaborate depictions, he is seated in front of a long table covered with all manner of food and drink.

The-Warmaster.name: The Warmaster
description: Phyreus, the @+Warmaster+@, is the goblinoid deity of war and death. They are most often depicted as a huge, fiery, three-eyed goblinoid, usually surrounded by the bodies of their slain foes.
